divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and myself witnessed 3 lights, 2 red, front and middle, and 1 white cluster of lights, trailing. looking at a 45 degree angle from the horizon with arms straight out and fingers pointing, the distance from front light to the back light was approx. 10 inches, could not see the form of the object but the lights moved as if it were one object. it moved from east to west the turned and moved north. there was no sound and moved at the speed of a blimp. it moved out of sight over the tree line.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Kennewick
There were no other sightings in Kennewick on or around July 31st 2012
Summary: 2 red lights 1 white cluster of lights at a distance of arms straight out pointing fingers 10 inches apart
